Class Leecher

java.lang.Object
Leecher
public class Leecher extends Object
The Leecher class is responsible for downloading a file from multiple seeders using a peer-to-peer (P2P) approach. It communicates with a tracker to get a list of seeders, downloads the file in chunks, and assembles the file. It also provides a graphical user interface (GUI) to display the download progress.

    • startDownload

      public void startDownload(String TARGET_FILE, String TRACKER_IP, String LEECHER_IP, String LEECHER_IP_PORT)
      Starts the download process in a separate thread.
      Parameters:
      TARGET_FILE - The file to download.
      TRACKER_IP - The IP address of the tracker.
      LEECHER_IP - The IP address of this leecher.
      LEECHER_IP_PORT - The port on which this leecher will act as a seeder.

    • downloadFile

      private void downloadFile(String TARGET_FILE, String TRACKER_IP, String LEECHER_IP, String LEECHER_IP_PORT) throws Exception
      Downloads the file from the seeders and updates the GUI.
      Parameters:
      TARGET_FILE - The file to download.
      TRACKER_IP - The IP address of the tracker.
      LEECHER_IP - The IP address of this leecher.
      LEECHER_IP_PORT - The port on which this leecher will act as a seeder.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the download process.

    • queryTracker

      private static List<String> queryTracker(String fileHash, String TRACKER_IP) throws Exception
      Queries the tracker for seeders hosting the specified file.
      Parameters:
      fileHash - The hash of the file to query.
      TRACKER_IP - The IP address of the tracker.
      Returns:
      A list of seeders in the format "IP:Port".
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during communication with the tracker.

    • downloadChunk

      private static byte[] downloadChunk(String ip, int port, int chunkNumber)
      Downloads a specific chunk from a seeder.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of the seeder.
      port - The port of the seeder.
      chunkNumber - The chunk number to download.
      Returns:
      The downloaded chunk as a byte array.

    • getTotalChunks

      private static int getTotalChunks(String seederIP, int seederPort)
      Retrieves the total number of chunks from a seeder.
      Parameters:
      seederIP - The IP address of the seeder.
      seederPort - The port of the seeder.
      Returns:
      The total number of chunks.
